title: Ivor Ho
text:
Major: Computational Biology
Education: Florida State University (Expecting 2027)
CV

title: About
text: I am gratefully stepping into Sophomore years in the Computational Biology in the Florida States University. I love doing research and enjoy exploring new things in the lab and anything related to Biology, medicine and data science. When not in lab, I play golf, ping-ping and watch football with my friends. I hope I will help discover new innovative ideas to help others. Go Seminoles!

title: Ivor Ho
text:
Literature review

IV –> DV
IV Causes DV
E.g.
Education makes one earn more money.
IV = Education DV = How much one earns = income
Education –> income

Hypothesis/Hypotheses

Hypothesis is a statement giving the relationship between independent variable(s) and dependent variable(s).

Data and Methods:

Data: How to collect data, how to process data, e.g. lab experiments, existing records, survey, big data methods such as social media scraping, web data
Methods: How to model the data, e.g. regression, t-test, etc.

Takeaways

Conclusion, what is learned from this, what is not, why?
